data.name: 洞主
data.text: Re Alice: 俺英语不咋好，看的明白就行哈哈哈

post.text:
#深夜emo
那年在London地铁上遇见个小哥哥，聊天中他问我去哪，我说kings cross.他：wow！what a magic place！u will meet your love！
我不明白：what is the mean of the love？
他耐心解释：who someone you love！like your girl friend your wife.
我：wow！really？thank you！I will meet a girl，A wonderful girl！but in fact she is my friend，just friend.....
后来又聊了好多，但我只记住了just friend
